articles.content: You cant buy the kind of publicity that has come in advance of the release of Dont Worry Darling. These days, the internet does it for free. With the FT having already put into perspective the online… [+3079 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Green
articles.title: Royal photographer behind final portrait of Queen recalls Her Majesty's quip - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ranald Mackechnie photographed the late monarch at her Windsor Castle home in May ahead of the Platinum Jubilee celebrations.
articles.content: The royal photographer who captured the portrait of the joyous Queen that was released on the eve of her funeral has revealed Her Majesty's witty remark when he asked her to smile - and said he could… [+7382 chars]
